00060 /*
00061  * Basic checks before starting.
00062  */
00063 bool CELFileConverter::Checks(const char *fileName, CELFileVersionType fileVersion) 
00064 {
00065         Clear();
00066 
00067         // Check if the file exists
00068         if (ConverterFileExists(fileName) == false)
00069         {
00070                 errorCode = FileDoesNotExist;
00071                 return false;
00072         }
00073 
00074         // Determine the format
00075         CELFileVersionType inVersion = CELFileVersion::DetermineCELFileVersion(fileName);
00076 
00077         // If unknown the return a false.
00078         if (inVersion == Unknown_Version)
00079         {
00080                 errorCode = InvalidCelFileFormat;
00081                 return false;
00082         }
00083 
00084     return true;
00085 
00086 }
00087 
00088 /*
00089  * Convert the file (inplace).
00090  */
00091 bool CELFileConverter::ConvertFile(const char *fileName, CELFileVersionType fileVersion, CELFileConversionOptions *options)
00092 {
00093     // Basic checks
00094     if(!Checks(fileName,fileVersion))
00095         return false;
00096 
00097         // Determine the format
00098         CELFileVersionType inVersion = CELFileVersion::DetermineCELFileVersion(fileName);
00099 
00100         // If same then done.
00101         if (inVersion == fileVersion)
00102         {
00103         return true;
00104     }
00105        
00106         // Move the input file name to a backup.
00107         string bakSuffix = ".bak";
00108         string bakFile = fileName + bakSuffix;
00109         if (ConverterMoveFile(fileName, bakFile.c_str(), true) == false)
00110         {
00111                 errorCode = UnableToRenameInputFile;
00112                 return false;
00113         }
00114 
00115 
00116         // Check the status and revert if needed.
00117         if (ConvertFile(bakFile.c_str(),fileName, fileVersion))
00118         {
00119                 ConverterRemoveFile(bakFile.c_str());
00120             return true;
00121         }
00122         else
00123         {
00124                 ConverterMoveFile(bakFile.c_str(), fileName, true);
00125             return false;
00126         }
00127 }
00128 
00129 /*
00130  * Convert the file.
00131  */
00132 bool CELFileConverter::ConvertFile(const char *fileName, const char *newFileName, CELFileVersionType fileVersion, CELFileConversionOptions *options)
00133 {
00134 
00135     // Basic checks
00136     if(!Checks(fileName,fileVersion))
00137         return false;
00138 
00139         // Determine the format
00140         CELFileVersionType inVersion = CELFileVersion::DetermineCELFileVersion(fileName);
00141 
00142         // If same then just copy.
00143         if (inVersion == fileVersion)
00144         {
00145         if(options != NULL) 
00146         {
00147             errorCode = UnableToMixConversionOptionsAndNoFormatChange;
00148             return false;
00149         }
00150         else
00151         {
00152                     if(ConverterCopyFile(fileName, newFileName, true))
00153             {
00154                 return true;
00155             }
00156             else
00157             {
00158                 errorCode = UnableToCopyFile;
00159                 return false;
00160             }
00161         }
00162         }
00163 
00164         // Convert the file.
00165         bool status = false;
00166         if (fileVersion == GCOS_Version3)
00167         {
00168                 CELFileConvertToASCII outFile;
00169                 if (inVersion == Calvin_Version1)
00170                 {
00171                         status = outFile.ConvertCalvinFile(fileName, newFileName, options);
00172                 }
00173                 else if (inVersion == GCOS_Version4)
00174                 {
00175                         status = outFile.ConvertXDAFile(fileName, newFileName, options);
00176                 }
00177                 errorCode = outFile.ErrorCode();
00178         }
00179         else if (fileVersion == GCOS_Version4)
00180         {
00181                 CELFileConvertToXDA outFile;
00182                 if (inVersion == Calvin_Version1)
00183                 {
00184                         status = outFile.ConvertCalvinFile(fileName, newFileName, options);
00185                 }
00186                 else if (inVersion == GCOS_Version3)
00187                 {
00188                         status = outFile.ConvertASCIIFile(fileName, newFileName, options);
00189                 }
00190                 errorCode = outFile.ErrorCode();
00191         }
00192         else if (fileVersion == Calvin_Version1)
00193         {
00194                 CELFileConvertToCalvin outFile;
00195                 if (inVersion == GCOS_Version3)
00196                 {
00197                         status = outFile.ConvertASCIIFile(fileName, newFileName, options);
00198                 }
00199                 else if (inVersion == GCOS_Version4)
00200                 {
00201                         status = outFile.ConvertXDAFile(fileName, newFileName, options);
00202                 }
00203                 errorCode = outFile.ErrorCode();
00204         }
00205         else
00206         {
00207                 errorCode = InvalidConversionInputs;
00208                 status = false;
00209         }
00210 
00211         // Check the status and revert if needed.
00212         if (status == false)
00213         {
00214                 ConverterRemoveFile(newFileName);
00215         }
00216 
00217         return status;
00218 }

00222 bool CELFileConverter::CreateFile()
00223 {
00224         // Get the number of probe sets.
00225         CCELFileHeaderData &gcosHeader = gcosCel.GetHeader();
00226 
00227         // Create a Calvin CEL object.
00228         outputFile = fileName.substr(0, fileName.length()-4) + ".calvin.CEL";
00229         CelFileData data(outputFile);
00230 
00231         // Add the header information.
00232         int nparams = gcosHeader.GetNumberAlgorithmParameters();
00233         for (int iparam=0; iparam<nparams; iparam++)
00234         {
00235                 ParameterNameValueType param;
00236                 string name = gcosHeader.GetAlgorithmParameterTag(iparam);
00237                 param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(name.c_str()));
00238                 param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(gcosHeader.GetAlgorithmParameter(name.c_str())));
00239                 data.AddAlgorithmParameter(param);
00240         }
00241         data.SetAlgorithmName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(gcosHeader.GetAlg()));
00242         data.SetArrayType(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(gcosHeader.GetChipType()));
00243         data.SetCols(gcosHeader.GetCols());
00244         data.SetRows(gcosHeader.GetRows());
00245         data.SetIntensityCount(gcosHeader.GetCells());
00246         data.SetStdDevCount(gcosHeader.GetCells());
00247         data.SetPixelCount(gcosHeader.GetCells());
00248         data.SetOutlierCount(gcosHeader.GetOutliers());
00249         data.SetMaskCount(gcosHeader.GetMasked());
00250 
00251         // Create a writer.
00252         try
00253         {
00254                 CelFileWriter writer(data);
00255                 int ncells = gcosHeader.GetCells();
00256                 FloatVector intensities;
00257                 intensities.resize(ncells);
00258                 for (int icel=0; icel<ncells; icel++)
00259                 {
00260                         intensities[icel] = gcosCel.GetIntensity(icel);
00261                 }
00262                 writer.WriteIntensities(intensities);
00263                 intensities.clear();
00264 
00265                 FloatVector stdv;
00266                 stdv.resize(ncells);
00267                 for (int icel=0; icel<ncells; icel++)
00268                 {
00269                         stdv[icel] = gcosCel.GetStdv(icel);
00270                 }
00271                 writer.WriteStdDevs(stdv);
00272                 stdv.clear();
00273 
00274                 Int16Vector pix;
00275                 pix.resize(ncells);
00276                 for (int icel=0; icel<ncells; icel++)
00277                 {
00278                         pix[icel] = gcosCel.GetPixels(icel);
00279                 }
00280                 writer.WritePixels(pix);
00281                 pix.clear();
00282 
00283                 int ioutlier=0;
00284                 int noutliers = gcosHeader.GetOutliers();
00285                 XYCoordVector coords(noutliers);
00286                 for (int icel=0; icel<ncells; icel++)
00287                 {
00288                         if (gcosCel.IsOutlier(icel) == true)
00289                         {
00290                                 coords[ioutlier].xCoord = gcosCel.IndexToX(icel);
00291                                 coords[ioutlier].yCoord = gcosCel.IndexToY(icel);
00292                                 ++ioutlier;
00293                         }
00294                 }
00295                 writer.WriteOutlierCoords(coords);
00296                 coords.clear();

00299                 int nmasked = gcosHeader.GetMasked();

00301                 for (int icel=0; icel<ncells; icel++)
00302                 {
00303                         if (gcosCel.IsMasked(icel) == true)
00304                         {
00305                                 coords[imasked].xCoord = gcosCel.IndexToX(icel);
00306                                 coords[imasked].yCoord = gcosCel.IndexToY(icel);
00307                                 ++imasked;
00308                         }
00309                 }
00310                 writer.WriteMaskCoords(coords);
00311 
00312         }
00313         catch (...)
00314         {
00315                 errorCode = UnableToWriteTheFile;
00316                 return false;
00317         }
00318         return true;
00319 }
